name: CallSource
overview: CallSource, Inc. develops and marikets call tracking and recording software products and provides training and advisory services that enable companies to capture and maximize phone leads, measure advertising effectiveness, and convert callers to customers. It offers CallTrack, which provides individual national toll-free and local telephone numbers to insert into each ad that want to track; and toll free vanity phone numbers. The company also provides CallMeNow that enables its clientsâ€™ customers to use Web browser to request a callback from sales representatives; Call2Action, which is used to deliver personal recorded messages to customersâ€™ telephones and voicemails; and FaceMail that is used to record and send a personal video message from desktop. In addition, it offers LeadManager, a Web-based lead tracking and management application for the multifamily industry; CallReview that is used to add a digital-format recording of each call to call-tracking database and allows its users to evaluate and improve teamâ€™s call-handling skills; and an online learning management system that centralizes various tools needed to enroll staff members and maintain training records. Further, the company provides a Telephone Performance Industry Report Card that tracks call-to-appointment conversion ratios and provides an objective report on the phone skills of dealership sales professionals. The company serves automotive, financial and mortgage, healthcare, multifamily housing, publishing, and media and advertising industries, as well as growing businesses. CallSource, Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Westlake Village, California with carrier-class VoIP-based data centers in Burbank and Chicago.
